title: Changan Ford International Curling Elite
text: The Changan Ford International Curling Elite (known formally as the Qinghai Curling Elite, Qinghai International and originally as the Qinghai China International) is an annual <a href="bonspiel">bonspiel</a>, or <a href="curling">curling</a> tournament, held in <a href="Xining">Xining</a>, <a href="Qinghai">Qinghai</a>, <a href="China">China</a>. It has been a part of both the Men's and Women's <a href="World%20Curling%20Tour">World Curling Tour</a> since 2016. The tournament is held in a <a href="Round-robin%20tournament">round robin</a> format. Over the three years that the tournament has been held, there has been teams from 15 different countries that have participated: Canada, China, Czech Republic, Estonia, Finland, Germany, Italy, South Korea, Netherlands, Norway, Russia, Scotland, Sweden, Switzerland and United States.
